complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Feed Data Model design into subtasks for each major table, including schema definition, indexing, and relationship mapping.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple interconnected tables and the need for careful consideration of relationships and indexing for performance.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Feed API Queries implementation into subtasks for each query type, including pagination, sorting, and access control logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to the variety of query types, need for efficient pagination, and complex filtering based on user permissions and relevance.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Feed API Mutations implementation into subtasks for each mutation type, including input validation, error handling, and access control.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to the number of mutation types, need for robust validation and error handling, and complex permission checks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Feed Subscription API implementation into subtasks for follow/unfollow actions, saved items, and subscription retrieval.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity due to straightforward CRUD operations, but requires careful handling of user relationships and permissions.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Feed Stream Component development into subtasks for data fetching, infinite scrolling, real-time updates, and performance optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to the need for efficient rendering, real-time updates, and handling of various feed types and states.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Post Creator Component creation into subtasks for rich text editing, media handling, post controls, and form submission.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to the rich text editing features, media upload handling, and need for a responsive and accessible interface.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Post Card Component development into subtasks for content display, interaction controls, expandable elements, and styling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate to high complexity due to the variety of content types, interaction features, and need for responsive design.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Comment Thread Component implementation into subtasks for comment display, creation, actions, and performance optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to the threaded structure, real-time updates, and need for efficient rendering of large comment sets.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Feed Filters Component creation into subtasks for filter options, UI elements, state management, and responsive design.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity due to the need for flexible filtering options and integration with the feed query system.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Notification System Integration into subtasks for notification triggers, content creation, delivery mechanisms, and user preferences.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate to high complexity due to the variety of notification types and the need for efficient delivery across multiple channels.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Mentions and Hashtags implementation into subtasks for text parsing, autocomplete functionality, database updates, and frontend integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate to high complexity due to the need for real-time parsing and autocomplete, as well as integration across multiple components.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Content Sharing Functionality implementation into subtasks for share dialog creation, content type support, integration, and analytics.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity due to the need to support various content types and integrate sharing across different platform sections.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Content Discovery Features implementation into subtasks for trending algorithms, topic following, recommendation engine, and discovery interface.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to the need for sophisticated algorithms for trending and recommendations, as well as integration with existing platform features.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Privacy and Moderation Tools implementation into subtasks for visibility controls, moderation dashboard, abuse reporting, and data privacy features.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to the sensitive nature of content moderation, need for robust privacy controls, and compliance with data protection regulations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Analytics and Reporting implementation into subtasks for data collection, metrics calculation, dashboard creation, and report generation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate to high complexity due to the need for comprehensive data collection, complex metric calculations, and creation of insightful reports without impacting system performance.
